meaningMnemonic: The <kanji>same</kanji> <kanji>accompany</kanji> means you are in the same place as someone, and you are accompanying them. This word means <vocabulary>to accompany</vocabulary>. This is only used for accompanying people.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
